text: Khe Antiokiŋ neŋgi buni khare. Mben gumgi mbari, mbe Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun nzuai. Mben gumgi mbari, mbe Fhe Bakɨme vuzvugi tɨvir mba Zisas zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi khɨvi. Mba ŋaara mbui gumgi zɨri khare, Barnabas gum, Simeon, ana zɨ mbe Niger, Rusius, Sairini ŋgu bakɨme guma, Sor gum, Manain. Manain, ana mba ŋgui gari guman vhari Herotan khurkhum ma. 13.1 Kha zɨ “Niger”, ne khaŋ nzuai, “Phɨɨgi.” Maaŋ muuŋgiap, gumgi mbari kha ndikndɨga mbui, Simeon, ana Afrika guma ma.
